comments.body:
nit: comment name needs to be `ToKubeOpenAPI`

can we also remove `ToGoOpenAPI` completely? https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/6d1e60a5897b36576dbd559a21b515908ecf7ef3/staging/src/k8s.io/apiextensions-apiserver/pkg/apiserver/schema/goopenapi.go
Adding this in parallel to `ToGoOpenAPI` is unfortunate. How will we avoid drift / bugs between the two? Is there a plan to eliminate one?
yes, we will cut the other (less-critical) bit of go-openapi dependency in the publishing pipeline.
